attributes.action: prevent banks for charging for basic accounts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you remember over the last few years the government has insisted that all benifits,pensions,unemployment incapacity etc are paid into a bank or post office account . Now the banks are talking of introducing charges of £150 per year to run accounts. Now I didn't ask for my wages to be paid into the bank and unemployment doesn't stretch to funding £12 per month so help by saying NO to the banks greed and help people , the aged,the sick,and disadvantaged to help themselves.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
